name: stench
description: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokemon flinch with each hit.

name: drizzle
description: Summons rain that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

name: speed-boost
description: Raises Speed one stage after each turn.

name: battle-armor
description: Protects against critical hits.

name: sturdy
description: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

name: damp
description: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokemon is in battle.

name: limber
description: Prevents paralysis.

name: sand-veil
description: Increases evasion to 1.25x during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

name: static
description: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokemon on contact.

name: volt-absorb
description: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

name: water-absorb
description: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

name: oblivious
description: Prevents infatuation and protects against captivate.

name: cloud-nine
description: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

name: compound-eyes
description: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3x.

name: insomnia
description: Prevents sleep.

name: color-change

name: immunity

name: flash-fire

name: shield-dust
description: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.

name: own-tempo
description: Prevents confusion.

name: suction-cups

name: intimidate

name: shadow-tag
description: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.

name: rough-skin

name: wonder-guard
description: Protects against damaging moves that are not super effective.

name: levitate
description: Evades ground moves.

name: effect-spore

name: synchronize
description: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokemon that inflicted them.

name: clear-body
description: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokemon.

name: natural-cure
description: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

name: lightning-rod
description: Redirects single-target electric moves to this Pokemon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

name: serene-grace
description: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

name: swift-swim
description: Doubles Speed during rain.

name: chlorophyll
description: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.

name: illuminate
description: Doubles the wild encounter rate.

name: trace

name: huge-power
description: Doubles Attack in battle.

name: poison-point
description: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokemon on contact.

name: inner-focus
description: Prevents flinching.

name: magma-armor
description: Prevents freezing.

name: water-veil
description: Prevents burns.

name: magnet-pull

name: soundproof

name: rain-dish
description: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.

name: sand-stream
description: Summons a sandstorm that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

name: pressure
description: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokemon by one.

name: thick-fat
description: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

name: early-bird
description: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

name: flame-body
description: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokemon on contact.

name: run-away
description: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

name: keen-eye
description: Prevents accuracy from being lowered.

name: hyper-cutter
description: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokemon.

name: pickup

name: truant
description: Skips every second turn.

description: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5x damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8x.

name: cute-charm
description: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokemon on contact.

name: plus
description: Increases Special Attack to 1.5x when a friendly Pokemon has plus or minus.

name: minus
description: Increases Special Attack to 1.5x when a friendly Pokemon has plus or minus.

name: forecast
description: Changes castform's type and form to match the weather.

name: sticky-hold
description: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokemon.

description: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.

description: Increases Attack to 1.5x with a major status ailment.

name: marvel-scale
description: Increases Defense to 1.5x with a major status ailment.

name: liquid-ooze
description: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

description: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5x damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

name: swarm
description: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5x damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

description: Protects against recoil damage.

name: drought

name: vital-spirit
description: Prevents sleep.

description: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokemon.

description: Doubles Attack in battle.

description: Protects against critical hits.

name: motor-drive
description: Absorbs electric moves, raising Speed one stage.

name: rivalry

name: steadfast
description: Raises Speed one stage upon flinching.

name: snow-cloak
description: Increases evasion to 1.25x during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

name: gluttony

name: anger-point

name: unburden
description: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.

name: heatproof
description: Halves damage from fire moves and burns.

name: simple
description: Doubles the Pokemon's stat modifiers.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

name: dry-skin
description: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25x, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

name: download
description: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one stage upon entering battle.

name: iron-fist
description: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2x their power.

name: poison-heal

name: adaptability

name: skill-link

name: hydration
description: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

name: solar-power
description: Increases Special Attack to 1.5x but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.

name: quick-feet
description: Increases Speed to 1.5x with a major status ailment.

name: normalize

name: sniper

name: no-guard

name: stall

name: technician

name: leaf-guard

name: mold-breaker

name: super-luck
description: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.

name: aftermath
description: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

name: anticipation

name: forewarn

name: unaware

name: tinted-lens

name: filter

name: slow-start

name: scrappy

description: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

name: solid-rock
description: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

description: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

name: friend-guard

name: light-metal

name: multiscale

name: flare-boost

name: telepathy

name: moody

name: overcoat

name: poison-touch

name: regenerator

name: analytic

name: imposter

name: infiltrator

name: mummy

name: prankster

name: sand-force

name: iron-barbs
description: Damages attacking Pokemon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

name: zen-mode

name: victory-star

name: turboblaze
description: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.

name: teravolt
description: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.

name: aroma-veil
description: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.

description: Protects friendly grass Pokemon from having their stats lowered by other Pokemon.

name: cheek-pouch

name: protean

name: fur-coat
description: Halves damage from physical attacks.

name: magician

name: bulletproof
description: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.

name: competitive
description: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

name: strong-jaw

name: sweet-veil

name: mega-launcher

name: gooey

name: aerilate

name: parental-bond

name: dark-aura

name: fairy-aura

name: aura-break

name: primordial-sea

name: desolate-land

name: delta-stream

name: stamina
description: Raises this Pokemon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

name: wimp-out

name: emergency-exit
description: This Pokemon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.

name: water-compaction
description: Raises this Pokemon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

name: merciless
description: This Pokemon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.

name: shields-down

name: stakeout
description: This Pokemon's moves have double power against Pokemon that switched in this turn.

name: water-bubble
description: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.

name: steelworker
description: This Pokemon's Steel moves have 1.5x power.

name: berserk

name: slush-rush

name: long-reach

name: liquid-voice

name: triage

name: surge-surfer

name: schooling

name: disguise

name: power-construct

name: corrosion

name: comatose

name: innards-out

name: battery

name: fluffy

name: dazzling
description: Opposing Pokemon cannot use priority attacks.

name: soul-heart

name: receiver

description: When an ally faints, this Pokemon gains its Ability.
